originaltripleset.otriple: Agra_Airport | icaoLocationIdentifier | "(Location of airport in India)"

lex.text: Agra Airport is in Uttar Pradesh Bundelkhand, it's ICAO location identifier is VIAG. the leader of Utterar Pradesh is Ram Naik.
lex.template: AGENT-1 is in BRIDGE-1 PATIENT-4 , AGENT-1 ICAO location identifier is PATIENT-1 . the leader of BRIDGE-1 is PATIENT-3 .
lex.lexicalization: AGENT-1 VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=singular] be in BRIDGE-1 PATIENT-4 , AGENT-1 ICAO location identifier VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=singular] be PATIENT-1 . DT[form=defined] the leader of BRIDGE-1 VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=singular] be PATIENT-3 .

lex.text: Agra Airport is located in Uttar Pradesh. Uttar Pradesh is part of both Awadh ad Bundelkhand. The Airport's ICAO location identifier is "VIAG". The leader of Uttar Pradesh is called Ram Naik.
lex.template: AGENT-1 is located in BRIDGE-1 . BRIDGE-1 is part of both PATIENT-2 PATIENT-4 . AGENT-1 ICAO location identifier is `` PATIENT-1 '' . The leader of BRIDGE-1 is called PATIENT-3 .
lex.lexicalization: AGENT-1 VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=singular] be located in BRIDGE-1 . BRIDGE-1 VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=singular] be part of both PATIENT-2 PATIENT-4 . AGENT-1 ICAO location identifier VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=active,person=3rd,number=singular] be `` PATIENT-1 '' . DT[form=defined] the leader of BRIDGE-1 VP[aspect=simple,tense=present,voice=passive,person=3rd,number=singular] call PATIENT-3 .
